AboutMe:
I am, apparently, an "Information Analyst"; which basically means I do a lot of SQL programming in Oracle, for an academic institution. Trying to bring order to chaos!... It keeps me off the streets.

Otherwise, I am a linguist (specialising in syntax and formal semantics) and a (pure) mathematician -- I have masters in both -- with a practical/hobbyist background in software development. So informatics is kind of my thing; but science, in general, actually... I also paint and draw and sculpt; speak Italian (badly) and Norwegian (very badly), amongst others in the works; and I cycle, a lot.

My life is my little koala, D ᘓᵔᵜᵔᘐ
